title: Assistant Director Marketing and Fan Experience - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assistant Director Marketing and Fan Experience College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: Use marketing and promotion strategies extensively in an effort to maximize attendance, create a preferred game environment and assist in attaining attendance and revenue goals for Athletics...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
